Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Pishoy and St. Paul of Tammah:

Text.Language: Hiten nie~u,/: n~te nao#c# n~io] m~mainous/ri: abba Piswi nem abba Paule: P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers, of my lords and fathers who love their children, Abba Pishoy and Abba Paul, O Lord, grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
بصلوات، سيدي الأباء محبي اولادهم، أنبا بيشوى وأنبا بولا، يارب انعم لنا بمغفرة خطايانا.
